Thanks, what is the output of "ldd /usr/lib/xulrunner-1.9.2.24/xulrunner-bin" ?
Oh, sorry, I should have asked for the output of "ldd /usr/lib/xulrunner-1.9.2.24/libxul.so" instead.
resolved using: (simple, but then why didn't do-release-upgrade do this?)
aptitude remove xulrunner-1.9.2 python-gtkmozembed couchdb-bin yelp gnome-user-guide python-desktopcouch python-desktopcouch-records -y
